title.rendered: Artificial intelligence in manufacturing: applications and implementation tips

<title>Artificial Intelligence in Manufacturing: Applications and Implementation Tips— ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Artificial intelligence in manufacturing has many applications. It can forecast raw material prices, spot tiny flaws in manufactured goods, and even generate design ideas. Despite its merits, AI in manufacturing is tricky to implement. Check out our recent article to discover more AI use cases and implementation tips." />
